name: Flowers Of Purgatory
description:
By: Team Flowery

Made for DevelUP's February 2022 Internal Game Jam.

Play as a boy who wakes up in a bleak, warped version of the hospital where he died. Get out of purgatory by locating a total of six origami flower letters and reading them one by one in the appropriate room. Only by turning on your flashlight, which draws monsters that spawn whenever you read the letters, can you verify if the room you're in fits the details provided in the letter. 

Little flower boy, you have bloomed and then wilted. 

Come hither, lay down. Submit to the halls of the dead. 

Are you ready?
